response.original_title: Charlotte Film Festival Shorts Programs: CRACKING UP (Narrative Shorts #1)
response.overview: Prepare for an outlandish viewing experience with this collection of narrative short films that leave maybe a little to the imagination and embrace the awkward and audacious.  Titles: Apology | Quick Fix | Maggie's Not Okay | Chips or Crackers | Spray Bottle | Somebody Cares | Te Seguir√© a la Oscuridad | The Callback | Such Good Friends | Back in Baby's Arms | Sammie Quits Football
response.title: Charlotte Film Festival Shorts Programs: CRACKING UP (Narrative Shorts #1)
